mapper.update: UPDATE ht_utm_reg SET invest_amount = #{accountDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invest_project_type = #{projectType}, invest_time = #{investTime}, invest_project_period = #{investProjectPeriod} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM ht_utm_plat

SELECT id AS id,source_id sourceId,source_name sourceName,del_flag delFlag,attorn_flag attornFlag,remark remark, create_group_cd createGroupCd, create_user_id createUserId,create_time createTime,update_group_cd updateGroupCd,update_user_id updateUserId,update_time updateTime,source_type sourceType FROM ht_utm_plat

SELECT utm_id utmId, utm_source utmSource,source_id sourceId,utm_medium utmMedium,utm_term utmTerm,utm_content utmContent, utm_campaign utmCampaign,utm_referrer utmReferrer,link_address linkAddress,remark remark,STATUS STATUS FROM ht_utm where 1=1
and utm_id = ${utmId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.user_id, a.user_name, a.utm_id, a.utm_name, a.order_code, a.borrow_nid, a.borrow_period, a.invest_amount, DATE_FORMAT(a.invest_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as invest_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_time, CASE WHEN ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender bt WHERE bt.user_id = a.user_id AND bt.create_time < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(assign_id) FROM hyjf_trade.ht_credit_tender ct WHERE ct.user_id = a.user_id AND ct.create_time < concat(a.invest_time) ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender_cpn bc WHERE bc.user_id = a.user_id AND bc.create_time < a.invest_time ), 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT count(id) FROM hyjf_trade.ht_hjh_accede ha WHERE ha.user_id = a.user_id AND ha.create_time < a.invest_time ), 0 ) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END is_first # CASE WHEN a.order_code = ttt.nid THEN '1' ELSE '0' END is_first FROM ( SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.nid AS order_code, ten.borrow_nid, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, ten.account AS invest_amount, ten.create_time AS invest_time FROM ht_utm_reg t INNER JOIN ht_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN ht_user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id AND ten.accede_order_id IS NULL INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow b ON ten.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid where 1=1
AND reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{registStartTime})
AND reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{registEndTime})
UNION ALL SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.accede_order_id AS order_code, ten.plan_nid AS borrow_nid, CONCAT( b.debt_lock_period, '个月' ) AS borrow_period, ten.accede_account AS invest_amount, ten.create_time AS invest_time FROM ht_utm_reg t INNER JOIN ht_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN ht_user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_debt_plan_accede ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_debt_plan b ON ten.plan_nid = b.debt_plan_nid where 1=1
AND reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{registStartTime})
AND reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{registEndTime})
UNION ALL SELECT t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.reg_time, utm.source_id AS utm_id, utm.utm_source AS utm_name, ten.assign_nid AS order_code, CONCAT('HZR', ten.credit_nid) AS borrow_nid, CONCAT(b.credit_term, '天') AS borrow_period, ten.assign_capital AS invest_amount, ten.create_time AS invest_time FROM ht_utm_reg t INNER JOIN ht_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id INNER JOIN ht_user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_credit_tender ten ON t.user_id = ten.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_credit b ON ten.credit_nid = b.credit_nid where 1=1
AND reg_time >= unix_timestamp(#{registStartTime})
AND reg_time <= unix_timestamp(#{registEndTime})
) AS a LEFT JOIN ht_user u ON a.utm_id = u.user_id ) mm
ORDER BY mm.invest_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
